title: Where Are My Item Sets Rito?????

replies.body:
This might be a bug, or a glitch on your computer. Item sets are stored locally, so it's entirely possible that something happened to the item sets on your computer, either by a program automatically tagging them or other things.

Are you able to view your item sets in the item set creator, but not in game by clicking the item set changer?

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=WpHrWIwM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-18T11:25:41.995+0000)
>
> This might be a bug, or a glitch on your computer. Item sets are stored locally, so it's entirely possible that something happened to the item sets on your computer, either by a program automatically tagging them or other things.
> 
> Are you able to view your item sets in the item set creator, but not in game by clicking the item set changer?

Yes. Soz for the late response.
